data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: The lines break after a hyphen, showing only the 4 first letters in the server switcher and renders in a chaotic way in Mutual Servers (certainly as a consequence of bug ZkshyYPj)
data.expected_result: Especially in the case where there are only 4 words before the hyphen, everything should be on a single line, as if there were no hyphens
data.short_description: If a pictureless server has a name containing hyphens every 4+ words, the server icon will render with linebreaks after each hyphen (shows only the first line in server switcher, and shows all lines in a chaotic way in Mutual servers and Server settings)
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a brand new server - Give it a name with a lot of words and with hyphens every 4 words (4 is the minimum), example `a a a a-a a a a-a a a a-a a a a` - (Optional) Invite someone to the server (Not a bot!) and open his Mutual Servers
